mapper.select: select i.iq_cd, m.mbr_nm, iqt.iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl, i.iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt, sa.sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path, ip.iqp_ans_cn, ip.iqp_reg_ymdt, a.adm_cd, m2.mbr_nm as adm_nm from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa using (sa_cd) inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) left join inquiry_process ip using (iq_cd) left join admin a using (adm_cd) left join member m2 on a.mbr_cd = m2.mbr_cd where i.iq_cd = #{inquiryCode} order by m.mbr_nm desc;

select i.iq_cd, m.mbr_nm, iqt.iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl, i.iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt, sa.sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa using (sa_cd) inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) order by i.iq_reg_ymdt desc;
